nodes.text: Trapped in the Death Star! is a young readers' book published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on November 1, 2016. The book is written at World of Reading level 2, and retells the rescue of Princess Leia from Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. The title includes stickers.
Han, Luke, Leia, and Chewie are trapped in the Death Star! Can C-3PO and R2-D2 save the day before Darth Vader finds them?
The tale was published on November 1, 2016.
